Title: Harmonized output control policies
Description: Harmonize output control policies and procedures across TREs within the federation. Consider output control policies for personal data as well as ther reasons it may be sensitive - IPR, commercial, military, potential for harm, etc.

Evidence.Evidence Artifact Example: Mapping of Local TRE Policies to Federated Baseline
Training and Guidance on Harmonized Output Controls
Federated Review or Audit of Output Control Harmonization
